mapper.sql: id, user_id, address_id, date, status, price, coupon_id, full_down_id, phone, code, delivery_time, remark
mapper.insert:
insert into order
id,
user_id,
address_id,
date,
status,
price,
coupon_id,
full_down_id,
phone,
code,
delivery_time,
remark,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fullDownId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update order
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
full_down_id = #{fullDownId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delivery_time = #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update order set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, full_down_id = #{fullDownId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_time = #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select o.*,u.*,a.* from order o,user u,address a where o.user_id = u.id and o.address_id = a.id
and o.id like CONCAT('%','${key}','%') or u.nickname like CONCAT('%','${key}','%') or a.address like CONCAT('%','${key}','%')
and o.status = #{status}
order by o.date DESC,o.status ASC
